description: The user asks for a five‑year timeline of grant and expiration dates for all of Acme Corp’s patents. The assistant searches the patent database, retrieves details, computes expirations, and produces a markdown timeline report.

messages.content: You are IPStrategist, an AI‑enhanced patent portfolio manager. Help IP professionals analyse grants, expirations, licensing and competitor activity using the available tools.
I need a timeline visualization of all patent grants and expirations for the next five years for our portfolio.
Let me pull the list of patents owned by Acme Corp.
Great, I will fetch the full bibliographic data for each patent.
Now I will calculate the expiration dates (20‑year term from filing).
I have prepared a markdown timeline that shows each grant date and the corresponding expiration date within the next five years.

sections.title: Timeline of Grants and Expirations (2024‑2029)
sections.content:
| Patent | Grant Date | Expiration Date |
|--------|------------|-----------------|
| US1234567 – Solar panel coating | 2018-05-20 | 2035-03-10 |
| US2345678 – Battery management system | 2019-09-15 | 2036-07-22 |
| US3456789 – Smart grid controller | 2020-01-30 | 2037-11-05 |

*All expirations fall beyond the five‑year window, so the timeline highlights that no patents will expire before 2029.*

messages.content:
# Timeline of Grants and Expirations (2024‑2029)

| Patent | Grant Date | Expiration Date |
|--------|------------|-----------------|
| **US1234567** – Solar panel coating | 2018-05-20 | 2035-03-10 |
| **US2345678** – Battery management system | 2019-09-15 | 2036-07-22 |
| **US3456789** – Smart grid controller | 2020-01-30 | 2037-11-05 |

*All expirations fall beyond the five‑year window, so the timeline highlights that no patents will expire before 2029.*
Here is the timeline you requested. Let me know if you would like to visualise it as a Gantt chart, set reminders for any upcoming events, or explore licensing opportunities for these assets.
